prompt:
Create 2 prompts for a cohesive, chronologically flowing Retirement  greeting card that tells a visual story (9:16 ratio):

ðŸŽ¨ CREATIVITY MANDATE: Be genuinely creative, unique, and innovative! Avoid generic or clichÃ© designs. Think outside the box, surprise with unexpected elements, use bold artistic choices, and create something truly memorable and special. Push creative boundaries while staying appropriate for the card type and tone.

Theme: "A cheerful funny retirement card for my sister who worked in computer support. She loves to workout, going to the beach, traveling "
Style: âœ¨ Smart Style
Tone: ðŸ˜„ Funny - humorous and lighthearted
To: Teresa 
From: Christina and John


Reference: "artistic transformation"

CRITICAL: Create a cohesive visual narrative that flows chronologically through the card experience:
1. FRONT COVER: First impression - sets the scene/introduces the story
2. INTERIOR SPREAD: The heart of the experience - continuation and climax of the visual story
3. BACK COVER: Conclusion - peaceful resolution or complementary ending

Requirements:
- Flat 2D artwork for printing (not 3D card images)
- Full-bleed backgrounds extending to edges
- IMPORTANT: Keep text, faces, and key elements at least 10% away from top/bottom edges (small amount may be cropped in printing)
- Keep text/faces 0.5" from left/right edges for safe printing
- CONSISTENT visual elements throughout: same characters, color palette, lighting, art style
- Progressive visual storytelling from front â†’ interior â†’ back
- Put any text in quotes and make it clear/readable
- Each section should feel like part of the same artistic universe
- TONE: Ensure the visual mood and atmosphere matches the humorous and lighthearted tone throughout all sections
- INTELLECTUAL PROPERTY SAFETY: If the user mentions specific characters, brands, logos, or products, automatically replace them with original generic alternatives in your prompts. For example: replace specific character names with "cartoon mouse character" or "superhero character", replace brand names with "colorful cereal" or "sports car", etc. Create inspired-by designs that capture the essence without referencing any protected names or specific copyrighted elements. Never include actual brand names, character names, or trademarked terms in the image generation prompts
- CONTENT SAFETY: Ensure all prompts are family-friendly and appropriate for greeting cards. Avoid any content that could be flagged by safety systems including: violence, weapons, inappropriate imagery, political content, controversial topics, scary or disturbing elements, or anything not suitable for all ages. If the user requests something potentially inappropriate, redirect to positive, wholesome alternatives that capture their intent in a family-friendly way
- Include visual humor, playful elements, and whimsical details





- Create cartoon/illustrated characters inspired by reference image - DO NOT make realistic depictions

Create prompts that flow chronologically:

1. Front Cover (Opening Scene): BE GENUINELY CREATIVE AND UNIQUE! Include "Retirement " greeting text positioned safely in the center area (avoid top/bottom 10% of image). I have included my own reference image. Create a stylized cartoon/illustrated character inspired by the reference image - DO NOT make realistic depictions of real people, instead create charming cartoon-style characters with simplified, friendly features. This is the story opening - introduce key visual elements (colors, motifs, artistic style) that will continue throughout the other sections. Think of something unexpected, innovative, and memorable that will surprise and delight the recipient. Avoid generic designs! Style: in a warm and sunny gouache and colored pencil illustration style. The scene depicts a vibrant, cheerful beach with soft, turquoise waves lapping at a sandy shore. A personalized character, joyfully transformed from her photo, is relaxing in a beach chair under a colorful umbrella, trading her computer mouse for a tropical drink. The illustration is filled with hand-drawn details: little illustrated passport stamps and travel icons playfully scattered in the sand, and a small, forgotten keyboard being overtaken by beautiful, blooming hibiscus flowers. The overall feeling is painterly and organic, with visible, soft textures and a bright, celebratory color palette that radiates happiness, freedom, and the promise of wonderful new adventures.

2. Back Cover (Story Resolution): BE SUBTLY CREATIVE! Create a simple yet innovative decorative design that brings peaceful closure to the visual story. Reference subtle elements from the front cover but keep it minimal and serene - NO PEOPLE, just beautiful, unexpected artistic elements that go beyond typical patterns or florals. Think of something quietly beautiful and memorable that complements the overall design while being genuinely unique. This should feel like a peaceful, artistic ending that surprises with its subtle creativity. Style: in a warm and sunny gouache and colored pencil illustration style. The scene depicts a vibrant, cheerful beach with soft, turquoise waves lapping at a sandy shore. A personalized character, joyfully transformed from her photo, is relaxing in a beach chair under a colorful umbrella, trading her computer mouse for a tropical drink. The illustration is filled with hand-drawn details: little illustrated passport stamps and travel icons playfully scattered in the sand, and a small, forgotten keyboard being overtaken by beautiful, blooming hibiscus flowers. The overall feeling is painterly and organic, with visible, soft textures and a bright, celebratory color palette that radiates happiness, freedom, and the promise of wonderful new adventures.

VISUAL CONTINUITY CHECKLIST:
- Same color palette across all sections
- Consistent lighting/time of day
- Same artistic techniques and brushwork
- Recurring visual motifs or symbols (but make them unique and memorable!)
- Progressive emotional journey from introduction to resolution
- Front cover: stylized cartoon/illustrated characters if people are needed for the theme
- Left interior: CREATIVE FREEDOM but NO PEOPLE unless user specifically requested people in their description
- Right interior: focus on message space with innovative decorative elements (NO PEOPLE)
- Back cover: simple yet creative decorative design without text or people
- Use simplified, friendly, charming character design if including people (front cover only)
- CREATIVITY PRIORITY: Always choose the more innovative, surprising, and memorable option over generic designs

Return JSON:
{
  "frontCover": "detailed prompt with story opening elements",
  "backCover": "detailed prompt with story conclusion elements"
}

IMPORTANT: Create a completely unique and different interpretation for this specific card variant. Use different creative approaches, color schemes, compositions, and artistic elements while maintaining the same core theme and requirements.

generatedPrompts.leftInterior: Left interior page of a retirement greeting card with a bright, textured yellow background. Dominating the left side of the image is a stylized, simplified illustration of a computer mouse, rendered in a light yellow with bold black outlines. A thin, dark green, curved cord extends from the mouse upwards, transforming into the trunk and stalk of a palm tree. The palm tree's fronds are depicted in a deep green, with thick, black outlines, suggesting a playful, almost graphic-novel-like quality. At the very top of the palm tree, a small, stylized heart shape is outlined in black and filled with a vibrant, warm orange. The overall artistic style is flat, 2D, with a subtle dot-patterned texture overlaying the entire image, particularly noticeable in the background and on the mouse. The composition is clean and symbolic, using simple shapes and a limited but cheerful color palette to convey a humorous transition from the digital world to a tropical, loved destination. There is no text present on this interior page.
generatedPrompts.rightInterior: Right interior page of a retirement greeting card designed for message space with a vibrant, cartoon-style illustration. The left side of the page features a stark, monochromatic visual of a stressed computer support worker, complete with headset and glasses, surrounded by binary code and a pixelated grid. This section subtly breaks away into colorful, geometric shards, transitioning into the main illustration. The right side of the page explodes with color and activity: a jubilant, athletic woman in a bright orange tank top and teal capri pants leaps joyfully, bursting forth from a shattered computer monitor. Behind her, a tropical beach scene with a bright sun and turquoise water is visible through the broken screen. Below this, three smiling, diverse cartoon characters in athletic wear are running along a wooden boardwalk surrounded by lush green foliage. The overall art style is bold and graphic, with strong outlines and flat colors, reminiscent of retro comic books or vintage animation. The color palette is warm and energetic, with dominant yellows, oranges, blues, and greens, conveying a sense of freedom and celebration. This entire design creates a clear visual narrative of transitioning from the structured, digital world of computer support to the liberating, active, and sunny world of retirement. There is no explicit text printed on this interior page, leaving ample space for a handwritten message.
